content.description: The figure above shows a 10 V battery connected in a circuit with two resistors, a parallel-plate capacitor of capacitance C, and three ammeters. The circuit has been connected for a long time.
content.question: Which of the following is correct about the voltage VC across the capacitor?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
